title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Develop a clear and detailed project scope, including functional and non-functional requirements for the OracleFarmForcast system.

title: Design AI Model Architecture
description: Create a design for the AI model that will analyze satellite imagery and predict crop yields.

title: Develop AI Model Algorithms
description: Implement the algorithms for the AI model to analyze satellite imagery and make predictions.

title: Develop Farm Image Preprocessing Pipeline
description: Create a pipeline to preprocess the satellite images before feeding them into the AI model.

title: Design User Interface for Dashboard
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface of the dashboard where farmers can view predictions.

title: Implement Dashboard User Interface
description: Build the frontend for the dashboard according to the designed wireframes and mockups.

title: Develop API Endpoints for Model and Dashboard
description: Create API endpoints to handle requests from the frontend and pass data to the AI model.

title: Integrate AI Model with Dashboard API Endpoints
description: Connect the AI model to the appropriate API endpoints for communication with the dashboard.
dependencies: Develop API Endpoints for Model and Dashboard

title: Conduct Model Training and Validation
description: Train the AI model on a dataset of satellite images and validate its performance.

title: Test AI Model and Dashboard Functionality
description: Perform thorough testing of the AI model and dashboard functionality to ensure proper operation.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the project design, implementation details, and usage instructions for future maintenance.
